title: Mixed Reality (MR)-Based Instructional Design Project for K-12 Education Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and basic understanding of digital tools
context.additional_context: Design and evaluation of MR learning environments linked to social studies curricula, utilizing learners' personal devices

learning_goals: Can design K-12 social studies learning modules utilizing MR (Mixed Reality) technology
Quantitative/qualitative evaluation tools can be developed for analyzing learning effectiveness
Strategies for operating MR-based PBL classes in a BYOD environment can be established

resources: MR Content Creation Software (Unity, MRTK, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
